Title: Updates the Pound Ridge Volunteer Exempt Firemen's Benevolent Association's charter
Summary: Updates the Pound Ridge Volunteer Exempt Firemen's Benevolent Association's charter and provides for new duties of such charter.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 260 of the laws of 1969, relating to incorporating the Pound Ridge Volunteer Exempt Firemen's Benevolent Association and providing for its powers and duties, in relation to updating such association's charter
